text: Me God Israelia Gitazir Dughiam Gɨnɨghnɨghamin Isam gamizɨ, a bar deraghavɨram oto. A God Israelia Gitazir Dughiam Gɨnɨghnɨghamin Isar Israelia fomɨra amizibagh afira, kar akam inigha izir gumazim Samuelɨn dughiamɨn ikegha, iza Atrivim Josaian dughiamɨn tu. Atrivir igharaziba isar kam gamizɨ, a deragha otozir puvatɨ. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn Atrivim Josaia, ofa gamir gumaziba ko, Livaiba ko, Judaba ko, Israelia ko, Jerusalemia, me bar isar kam gamizɨ, a bar deraghavɨram oto.
